items.title: California fires weather forecast: 'Dangerous' wind situation begins early Tuesday
items.description: The strongest gusts are expected Tuesday morning and early afternoon, which will then be followed by a break in the evening.

items.title: Human remains 'in various states of decomposition' found on public hiking trail
items.description: Human remains that had been decomposing “for an extended period of time” have been discovered just off of a public hiking trail in Utah, police said.

items.title: WATCH:  Cal Fire battalion chief speaks on battling the fires on the front lines

items.title: WATCH:  Woman whose wedding ring was found in rubble after California fire shares her story
items.description: Victoria DeSantis' Altadena house was completely destroyed by the Eaton fire, but firefighters helped her uncover a symbol of hope amid the rubble.
